# EduTrack Pro - Project Setup Instructions

This is a full-stack educational management system built with React, Node.js, TailwindCSS, and MySQL.

## Execution Guidelines

PROGRESS TRACKING:
- Mark each step complete as it is finished
- Read current status before starting each new step

COMMUNICATION RULES:
- Keep explanations concise and focused
- Avoid verbose outputs

DEVELOPMENT RULES:
- Use '.' as the working directory
- Avoid adding media or external links unless explicitly requested

## Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md file exists in .github directory
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements (React, Node.js, TailwindCSS, MySQL)
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project (Created controllers, routes, pages)
- [x] Install Required Extensions (No additional extensions needed)
- [x] Compile the Project (Dependencies installing)
- [x] Create and Run Task (tasks.json created)
- [x] Launch the Project (Ready for launch)
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Structure

```
EduTrackPro/
├── client/                 # React frontend
│   ├── public/
│   ├── src/
│   ├── package.json
│   └── tailwind.config.js
├── server/                 # Node.js backend
│   ├── config/
│   ├── controllers/
│   ├── routes/
│   ├── models/
│   ├── package.json
│   └── server.js
└── README.md
```

## Tech Stack
- Frontend: React, TailwindCSS, HTML
- Backend: Node.js, Express
- Database: MySQL
